greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: G.f.: (1-x^4)/(1-x+x^8)
comment: The Gi1 sums, see A180662, of triangle A108299 equal the terms of this sequence.
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,0,0,0,0,-1).
maple: A193669 := proc(n) option remember: coeftayl((1-x^4) / (1-x+x^8) ,x=0,n) end: seq(A193669(n), n=0..57);
results.author: _Johannes W. Meijer_, Aug 11 2011
